text.0: we crave of savitar the god this treasure much to be enjoyed.
text.1: the best allyielding conquering gift of bhaga we would gladly win.
text.2: savitars own supremacy most glorious and beloved of all.
text.4: for savitar who is bhaga shall send riches to his worshipper.
text.6: send us this day god savitar prosperity with progeny.
text.7: drive thou the evil dream away.
text.8: savitar god send far away all sorrows and calamities.
text.9: and send us only what is good.
text.10: sinless in sight of aditi through the god savitars influence.
text.11: may we obtain all lovely things.
text.12: we with our hymns this day elect the general god lord of the good.
text.14: he who for ever vigilant precedes these twain the day and night.
text.16: he who gives glory unto all these living creatures with the song.
text.17: and brings them forth is savitar.
